Detailed Description

Previews an image and allows the user to upload it with the Twitpic API, returning a URL location to the uploaded image.

Use this dialog by showing it modal with ShowModal() and then use GetUrl() to retrieve the URL. For example: 

   ImagePreviewDialog dlg(this);
   if (dlg.ShowModal() == wxID_OK) {
     wxString url = dlg.GetUrl(); 
     // ...use the URL here...
   }

ImagePreviewDialog::DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE (  ) 

wxString ImagePreviewDialog::GetUrl (  )  const [inline]

Retrieves the URL location (empty if there was a problem).

void ImagePreviewDialog::ImageUpload ( wxString &  filename  ) 

Thread callback method for image uploading.

If this succeeds, imageUrl should be filled with the uploaded image URL location, otherwise it is set to the empty string.

Warning:
This method runs in a separate thread and should not interact directly with the GUI.

bool ImagePreviewDialog::IsValidImage ( wxString &  filename  )  [static]

Helper method to test if an image can be loaded by wxWidgets by Testing if there is a valid wxImageHandler for the filename extension.

Precondition:
filename must have an extension
Parameters:
filename the filename to test (does not read the contents, just the extension)
Returns:
whether or not the image can be previewed (valid image file)
